person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: He said at one point during a press conference : " I have seen my whip ( party manager ) for next week which , of course , does n't mean very much to me now . "

Let's think step by step.

1. He: This is a pronoun referring to the speaker in the paragraph. It is a person entity.
2. I: This is also a pronoun referring to the speaker in the paragraph. It is a person entity.
3. whip: This is a title given to a senior party official in charge of enforcing discipline in a political party. It is a person entity, specifically a person with a particular role in a political party.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: He said at one point during a press conference : " I have seen my whip ( party manager ) for next week which , of course , does n't mean very much to me now . "

2. Determine which entities are locations. In this context, a location is a place or area where something happens.
3. Based on the given context, "press conference" is the location entity in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.
The location entity in the paragraph is "press conference".
